name: Link to Dictionary Meaning
author: Bee Dictionary

sections.description:
Link to Dictionary Meaning allows you to quickly set links for difficult words to Bee English Dictionary definitions of words/phrases containing meaning, audio, phonetics, usages and other informations.

*Write “{bd:polemic}” to create a link to the english lemma of “polemic”.

More information

For more information visit the Bee English Dictionary website at http://www.beedictionary.com/ or write to
bd.support [AT] beedictionary.com for comments and support.

sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin package to your wp-content/plugins directory
  2. Unzip the package (unzip lexidef.zip)
  3. Go to your “plugins” administration page and activate the “Link to Dictionary Meaning” plugin
